SELECT games.* FROM ( SELECT a.game_id, count(*) AS cnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY count(*) DESC) as rn FROM order_detail a GROUP BY a.game_id ) od, games WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 10 AND od.game_id = games.game_id ORDER BY cnt DESC

SELECT games.*, od.* FROM ( SELECT a.game_id, count(*) AS cnt, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY count(*) DESC) as rn FROM order_detail a, orders o WHERE a.order_id = o.order_id AND o.order_date > sysdate - 7 GROUP BY a.game_id ) od, games WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 10 AND od.game_id = games.game_id ORDER BY cnt DESC
